page.title: 09The Old Homestead
page.content:
My name is Douglas Laurie Pile.I am seven and a half years old.I live at the Old Homestead,Chapel Road, Breachwood Green. I have two brothers Duncan and Angus.We live in a very old
house about 500 yrs old.It is timber framed.When we moved in to the house it looked like an ordinary house ,no beams showing ,but then we started to peel off the wallpaper and chip away the plaster and discoverd that it was timber framed.We helped Daddy to knock down the modern fireplace and found a 12 foot wide inglenook underneath. The work made a lot of dust and rubble which we took outside in our wheelbarrows.
